title: Could we make a list of all companies and projects that failed because of protests and government incompetency?
selftext:
E.g POSCO India

I was watching a video by Charlie Munger on India learning from Singapore and that led me to wonder how many such projects failed because of our inept system.

Could we work on a list, please? I will add them to this post based on your comments.

[(128) Charlie Munger on Lee Kuan Yew and Singapore's Success | Daily Journal 2017 【C:C.M Ep.263】 - YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y3M4uKKVuEo)

[POSCO India - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/POSCO_India)
comments: It is an accurate summary. What more should I add to the title? What should I remove? Just tell me already.

incompetency and corruption*

BSNL
and private telecom companies too.
Asking for crores of money by making a rule change in back date has a major role in weakening of Vodafone to the extent to be forced to merge with other company.
